channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Jamel Dargan

item.title: Linear Regression in Python
item.description: What is Regression? Put simply, regression is a method for finding a relationship between variables… (view article on Medium) > Defining linear regression and implementing an example in python: * Boston Housing dataset * Visualization in matplotlib * Mean Squared Error (MSE)

item.title: K-means Clustering in Python
item.description: In this article, we discuss an implementation of the K-means clustering algorithm in Python. We use the sklearn IRIS dataset to train and test a model, with the aim of distinguishing among three plant species. We then colorize scatter plot visualizations of the data. … (view article on Medium) > We will review: * What is K-means clustering, and what are its advantages? * Describing the K-means clustering algorithm * How to implement K-means clustering in Python
